title: I GOT PUNISHED FOR A SERVE ISSUE
body:
I jumped into a ranked game and the second champ select finished the reconnect screen popped up. I clicked it for a minute straight and it kept saying failed to reconnect. Then I restarted the client came back and the same thing happened. Eventually I got put back in the home screen because my team probably did a remake just to find a leave buster pop up and now I have to wait 9 minutes for my next 10 games. Thing is ranked was disabled on NA because of a bug causing players to disconnect randomly. The sign of the bug existing went away so I went into a ranked game and I couldn't get in???? 
Can I please get this leaver buster removed.

replies.body: The game i'm in right now keeps crashing and I can't get in the game. Right after champ select I got a disconnect while i'm in league buster. How is this fair I can't even connect to the game.
I no longer have the issue after uninstalling and then reinstalling league but thank you for your feedback anyway.

Well I just unistalled then reinstalled to see if anything changes but it was more of a crash that kept happening and no matter how many times I clicked reconnect the crash sign kept coming back up. It was like I complete couldn't get into the game.
Riot needs to hire a better support.

Same here 

Please check these posts of same issue , RIOT.

Disconnecting from a match negatively impacts everyone in it, regardless of intention. This is a big reason why all disconnections are treated equally by the system and why penalties cannot be modified or removed.

I wasn't able to find any record of a server issue causing disconnections during the time you posted this. Most disconnections are caused by local settings on your network that cause a poor connection to the server. I strongly recommend working through the steps within our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as the first step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
